name: DailySignal
text: The COVID-19 pandemic has ushered in months of uncertainty for families with children in K-12 schools—but South Carolina officials made one thing clear today: The state’s families will have MORE options this academic year. https://t.co/dSR8LjKoFG

name: DailySignal
text: RT @JM_Butcher: The new scholarships come at an auspicious time because large school districts in neighboring states are refusing to offer in-person learning. https://t.co/V29nrfzWXd via @JM_Butcher @DailySignal Great to be there at the announcement today. @PalmettoPromise https://t.co/OMBLX8NGbt
